attributes.action: Let Driving Instructors continue to work safely during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: To reduce the already mounting debt (due to previous 4 month lockdown),  anxiety and worry from driving instructors who are self employed with no income. To provide people with the opportunity to a vital life line of obtaining a driving licence for job prospects in this unprecedented time and to help vulnerable and elderly members of their family.
attributes.background: To override the ban of driving instructors being able to work safely in lockdown including key workers!
